meanings.definition: A person with senior managerial responsibility in a business organization.
meanings.sent1: The executive made important decisions for the company.
meanings.sent2: The executive led the team meeting with confidence.
meanings.sent3: The executive joked about having to make tough choices all day.
meanings.sent4: She was the executive of her own life, steering it in the direction she wanted.
meanings.sent5: The executive's office was always bustling with activity.

meanings.definition: Having the power to put plans, actions, or laws into effect.
meanings.sent1: The executive order was immediately implemented.
meanings.sent2: The executive decision was well-received by the team.
meanings.sent3: The executive cat in the house was the one who decided when playtime started.
meanings.sent4: Her executive presence commanded attention in the boardroom.
meanings.sent5: The executive authority was evident in the way he carried himself.
